page.title: 12WADDINGTON INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: There is an industrial estate off the main Grantham Road. There are a sign maker, a timber supplier, a camping and outdoor shop, an insurance broker, and two servicing garages. One of the garages also deals with second-hand Japanese motor bike accessories. One of the garages has two employees, who would both like a pay rise. The best part of their day is relaxing in their tea break after working too hard. Both garages only service cars and do M.O.T. but do occasionally buy a car which has failed its M.O.T. The owners needed around Â£2000 to start their businesses. They do not want to move their garages because they have enough work locally, but people do come to them from outside Waddington.
